title: Changes access to a given file
name: ChangeAccess
description: When status is set to public - this file becomes searchable, and accessible through a direct link on cloud storage

examples.title: Authorization-Example:
examples.content: "Authorization: JWT myreallyniceandvalidjsonwebtoken"

Body.description: when set to false makes file Private, true - makes it public

examples.title: Example usage:
Success-Finish:
examples.content: HTTP/1.1 204 No Content

examples.title: ValidationError:
UnauthorizedError:
UserNotFoundError:
ForbiddenResponse:

title: Download provided file
name: DownloadFile
description: Returns signed URL that can be used to download file. Make sure that when you insert :filename, it's processed by encodeURIComponent

examples.title: Authorization-Example:
examples.content: "Authorization: JWT myreallyniceandvalidjsonwebtoken"

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -i -H 'Accept-Version: *' -H 'Accept: application/vnd.api+json' -H 'Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate' \
  -H "Authorization: JWT therealtokenhere" \
  "https://api-sandbox.cappacity.matic.ninja/api/files/download/v%40example.com%2F49058df9-983e-43b6-8755-84b92c272357"

examples.title: Success-Download:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 302 Moved Temporarily
X-Content-Preview: 4-xxxx
X-Content: yyyy-zzzz
X-Content-MD5: base64(md5Hash)
Location: https://storage.googleapis.com/bucket-name/username/49058df9-983e-43b6-8755-84b92c272357?GoogleAccessId=xxx&expires=231283612781232&signature=xxx

examples.title: ValidationError:
ForbiddenResponse:
UnauthorizedError:
UserNotFoundError:
PreconditionFailedError:

title: notifies about completed file upload
name: FinishUpload
description: Sets status of the file to uploaded and puts it into post-processing queue. Returns location of the file and code 202. It means that file had been pushed to post processing queue, but still not available for download. Client should poll status of this file in order to find out when it's ready. 412 error will be returned until it's available for download

examples.title: Authorization-Example:
examples.content: "Authorization: JWT myreallyniceandvalidjsonwebtoken"

examples.title: Example usage:
Success-Finish:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 202 Accepted
Location: https://api-sandbix.cappacity.matic.ninja/api/files/49058df9-983e-43b6-8755-84b92c272357"

examples.title: UserNotFoundError:
ValidationError:
ForbiddenResponse:
UnauthorizedError:
PreconditionFailedError:
PreconditionFailedError:
Authorization-Example:
examples.content: "Authorization: JWT myreallyniceandvalidjsonwebtoken"

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -H 'Accept-Version: *' -H 'Accept: application/vnd.api+json' -H 'Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate' \
  -H "Authorization: JWT therealtokenhere" \
  "https://api-sandbox.cappacity.matic.ninja/api/files" | gunzip

Query.description: how many files to return per page
encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(filterObject)), pass it as value. # - filters by filename, other keys - by allowed metadata
encodeURIComponent(sortBy), if not specified, sorts by createdAt, otherwise by metadata field passed here

Code 200.description: set as offset for the next page
current status of the file: pending, uploaded, processed
link to the owner of the resource, optionally present

examples.title: Success-Finish:
ForbiddenResponse:
UnauthorizedError:
UserNotFoundError:
ValidationError:

title: returns information about specific file
name: GetInfo
description: Returns information about specific file that belongs to a user. When status is processed - it can be downloaded. Filename includes username prefix when attached to an owner. Make sure that when you insert :filename, it's processed by encodeURIComponent

examples.title: Authorization-Example:
examples.content: "Authorization: JWT myreallyniceandvalidjsonwebtoken"

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -H 'Accept-Version: *' -H 'Accept: application/vnd.api+json' -H 'Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate' \
  -H "Authorization: JWT therealtokenhere" \
  "https://api-sandbox.cappacity.matic.ninja/api/files/info/49058df9-983e-43b6-8755-84b92c272357" | gunzip

Code 200.description: link to the owner of the file

examples.title: Success-Finish:
ForbiddenResponse:
UnauthorizedError:
UserNotFoundError:

title: Get preview of a provided file
name: PreviewFile
description: Returns optimized image with provided modifiers that is supposed to be cached by CDN

Params.description: * Supported modifiers are: *                          * height:       eg. h500                          * width:        eg. w200                          * square:       eg. s50                          * crop:         eg. cfill                          * top:          eg. y12                          * left:         eg. x200                          * gravity:      eg. gs, gne                          * filter:       eg. fsepia                          * external:     eg. efacebook                          * quality:      eg. q90

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -i -H 'Accept-Version: *' -H 'Accept: application/vnd.api+json' -H 'Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate' \
  -H "Authorization: JWT therealtokenhere" \
  "https://api-sandbox-dev.matic.ninja/api/files/preview/h200-w200-cfill/really-nice-path-to-image.png"

examples.title: Success-Download:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
binarycontentofimage

examples.title: ValidationError:
UserNotFoundError:

title: Initiates new file upload
name: UploadFile
description: Initializes file upload, creating a resumable session id, which will be valid for a couple of hours and can be used to upload a file directly to storage provider

examples.title: Authorization-Example:
examples.content: "Authorization: JWT myreallyniceandvalidjsonwebtoken"

Body.description: custom name of the file for the user
md5 checksum of the file to be uploaded
content-type of the file to be uploaded
content-length of the file to be uploaded

Success-Upload:
ValidationError:
